tweet_text: @hunterjones23 Know a guy who's the equivalent of a senior analyst at a boutique ibank but has the title of Vice President. When anyone asks him what he does for a living he just responds "I'm a VP". That's it, no further explanation. People seem to be impressed by it. We live in funny times.

tweet_text: And that’s all I was hoping for; an admission of guilt and a willingness to fix things. Because I’ve been there. I’ve written code. That’s what I do. I know errors happen. To me it was good enough that the item not reach my door and I be refunded for it. I just wanted it fixed.

text_en: Hey, what if states set state income/sales tax rates, and the money all went directly to the federal government. And then the federal government set federal income tax rates, and the money all went directly to states. They wouldn't benefit themselves from raising taxes, ever.
